overview: Black Diggers tells the untold story of Indigenous Australian soldiers in WWI, following their stories from their homelands to the battlefields of Gallipoli, Palestine and Flanders. An extraordinary all-Indigenous cast enacted the stories of these heroic men, largely unrecognised by history.
tagline: If they're willing to get up off their backsides and show a bit of pluck then they're white enough for me!
title: Black Diggers
